title: 8-9am- Taylor Swift Controversy & a Kid Gets a Tattoo
itunes:title: 8-9am- Taylor Swift Controversy & a Kid Gets a Tattoo
description: People are calling out a Taylor Swift video for being condescending towards people of size, Rihanna is going to be featured on the Wakanda Forever soundtrack, people on Reddit weigh in on America, Drake and 21 Savage are dropping an album, Snoop Dogg smokes more joints than you think, Sheryl Crow says someone threw poop at her at a concert, the weekend is looking clear but we might get rain next week, the founder of Hobby Lobby is giving his company away, Apple is switching to the USB-C cord, a mom let her 10 year old son get a tattoo, The cheapest big city for fast food, a lady came up with a way to not have to do dishes, and Vinnie reads your texts!
